mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lewis gives the account with Blagden as it now stands, taken from papers of Dr. Thornton's -- Â£26.8.11 1/2 Maryland money is still due him -- Lewis asks Blagden to send authenticated vouchers for repayment of moneys expended so that the late General Washington's heirs will see the justification for the expense.
